Text: Cornhusker Contract Information Cc Attached are completed letters to the parties requested As you will note there are two letters to Lone Star and two letters for Apache Since you are sending these electronically to Michael Mazowita for him to obtain the signature of Rick Vicens please have copies of the executed letters sent to Sandi Brabands attention These letters will have to be printed on appropriate letterhead and copies sent to the CCs at the bottom of each letter If you have any questions please let me know Bob Walker Sr Legal Specialist

Re Cornhusker Contact Information Cc need the contact name phone number and address for the ENA contact and a name for the the letter for them to contact with questions These were questions and on the original list from Sandi Thanks Bob Daren J Farmer AM To Sandi M CT Robert CT Garrick CT Brian CT John nron Charles NRON Dan CT John CT cc Subject Cornhusker Contact Information Please see below D Forwarded by Daren J FarmerHOUECT on AM Mark NRON AM To Daren J CT Pat NRON Stacey CT cc Subject Cornhusker Contact Information Lone Star Pipeline Lisa McAuliff Contracts Wilma Easter Scheduling phone phone fax fax S Harwood N Dallas TX Williams Energy Jeff Goforth phone fax PO Box Tulsa OK Cinergy Marketing Trading Agent for Apache Lisa Hughes phone fax FM W Houston TX Note Cinergy will be moving downtown next month White Pine Energy LLC Michael MazowitaDirector of Asset Mgmt phone fax cell Auburndale Street Livonia MI

Changes to Schedule Cc There are some changes that need to be made to the Material Contract List Schedule of the Purchase Contracts contract the contract number is incorrect and should be of the Purchase Contracts Global Contract the contract number is incorrect and should be s and of the Sales Contracts should be deleted from the list These are transactions and are being placed under Global contract Item X Newco contract an updated list is shown below Global Contract NoCounterparty City of Brazoria DH Gas Company Inc Entex Gas Marketing Company Markham Gas Corp Reliant Energy Entex Reliant Energy Entex Reliant Energy Entex Reliant Energy Entex Southern Union Company Southern Union Company TXU Fuel Company TXU Fuel Company TXU Fuel Company Unit Gas Transmission Company Inc Entex Gas Resources Corp Entex Gas Resources Corp under b the following language needs to be added The Agreement requires consent of GPPs project finance lenders to be assigned to HPL This consent is in the process of being obtained Pending receipt of this consent a contract mirroring the economic terms shall be i n place between HPL and ENA This contract also appoints HPL as ENAs agent for nominations and associated functions The credit risks are allocated i n this contract as if an actual assignment of the Agreement had been made b y ENA to HPL Enron Corp guaranteed ENAs obligations under the Agreement A substitute AEP guaranty will likely be required in connection with the consent Forwarded by Robert WalkerHOUECT on PM Kimberlee A Bennick AM To Robert CT cc Subject Revised Schedules Forwarded by Kimberlee A BennickHOUECT on AM Wills Anthony PM To Kimberlee Bennick Email B ob Walker Email Anne Koehler Email Barbara Gray Email om cc Collins Christopher Subject Revised Schedules Attached are the following documents Revised clean version of the Schedules to the PSA Marked version of the Schedules to the PSA Revised Appendix b Schedule a Please note appendix b and schedule a are attached as separate documents due to technical difficulties in incorporating them into the master list of schedules Also according to Tanya Rowhauer the guaranty agreement forwarded to me from Dan Hyvl should not be a part of the schedules After your review of the attached please call me with your comments Regards Anthony C Wills Vinson Elkins LLP First City Tower Fannin Houston TX phone fax CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE The information in this email may be confidential andor privileged This email is intended to be reviewed by only the individual or organization named above If you are not File Transfer Formsee the note below and form This should be easier than copying floppies If you have any question please contact Heather Thanks Bob Forwarded by Robert WalkerHOUECT on AM Heather A nronXgate AM To Robert CT cc Tommy nronXgate Subject File Transfer Form Bob Here is the transfer form to request files to be transferred Please have everyone fill it out by June th and email it to me I will call to set up an appointment at each persons desk to transfer the files I will then review them and burn the CD You will have the CD by June th Thanks Heather x

Dinner on Wednesday May San Antonio Legal Conferenceam really glad you have decided to join us for Dinner We will gather at the front desk about pm to walk over to Delores del Rio together If you are late I will leave directions with the desk and you can walk over My understanding is that it is a very short walk from the hotel to the restaurant Hope you enjoy it I know we did the last time See you tonight Thanks Bob

List of Agreements for Denver Cc Per the request of Gerald attached below is a list of the agreements we have compiled Please check this list to assure that this is a complete and correct list Thanks Bob

Merrick Cc to document the Merrick contract I need some information I need the legal name of Merrick the state of incorporation a physical address telephone and fax numbers scope of work date work began and a contact name at Merrick If you have any questions please give me a call Thanks Bob

DPLynx Pricing IssuesI left you a message about this issue on Tuesday I really need your input before we make the payments to Lynx Could we meet today sometime or talk on the phone Thanks BOb Forwarded by Robert WalkerHOUECT on AM Cynthia Hakemack AM To Julie CT cc Robert CT Melissa CT Subject DPLynx Pricing Issues Julie Im working with Legal and Bob Surles with Lynx Energy Company on some pricing issues regarding meter I have verified with Bob Fischer in the Transport Group the transportation rates that HPLC is paying to Gulf Coast Pipeline Company which in turn must be paid to HPLC by Lynx Energy Would you please change Sitara to reflect the transportation rates shown on the schedule below Also Ive recalculated the average price and need you to make those changes too Thanks Sitara Period Transport Rate Price HSC less HSC less fwd HSC less

DPLynx Pricing IssuesI left you a message about this issue on Tuesday I really need your input before we make the payments to Lynx Could we meet today sometime or talk on the phone Thanks BOb Forwarded by Robert WalkerHOUECT on AM Cynthia Hakemack AM To Julie CT cc Robert CT Melissa CT Subject DPLynx Pricing Issues Julie Im working with Legal and Bob Surles with Lynx Energy Company on some pricing issues regarding meter I have verified with Bob Fischer in the Transport Group the transportation rates that HPLC is paying to Gulf Coast Pipeline Company which in turn must be paid to HPLC by Lynx Energy Would you please change Sitara to reflect the transportation rates shown on the schedule below Also Ive recalculated the average price and need you to make those changes too Thanks Sitara Period Transport Rate Price HSC less HSC less fwd HSC less
